commit_list.message:
Using fully qualified domain names for the example nodes.

 FQD names are needed becauses ActorDB requires the use of the `-name` setting in vm.args rather than `-sname`, and will complain about other nodes not having a FQD.

commit_list.message:
Remember, both short node name and fully qualified node name must both be unique across cluster.

Works:
actordb1@actordb1.local & actordb2@actordb2.local & actordb3@actordb3.local

Does NOT Work:
actordb@actordb1.local & actordb@actordb2.local & actordb@actordb3.local

commit_list.message:
Changed `options_pixie_process_bulk_action` action to be
`options_pixie_process_action` filter.

This allows the same process flow to be used for row level actions.
First param is now whether a redirect is required, true/false,
default is false.
Second param is action name.
Third is single or array of `option_id`s.
Fourth is `blog_id`, blank if single site install.

repo_list.description: A modern dockerized LAMP and MEAN stack alternative to XAMPP
MariaDB 10.1 on CentOS 7
Enable Media Replace, a WordPress plugin to make it possible to replace uploaded media files in a simple way.
A simple synchronous Event Bus for Desktop and Web Edition Real Studio projects.
A simple example desktop application project using EventBusIJ, the simple synchronous Event Bus for Desktop and Web Edition Real Studio projects.
A simple example web application project using EventBusIJ, the simple synchronous Event Bus for Desktop and Web Edition Real Studio projects.
Embed readme files in pages/posts.
Xojo code for implementing self-updating apps
Unified, asynchronous, easy-to-use library for browser-based storage. Kinda sorta a port of Lawnchair to Dart.

HTML5 <audio> or <video> player with support for MP4, WebM, and MP3 as well as HLS, Dash, YouTube, Facebook, SoundCloud and others with a common HTML5 MediaElement API, enabling a consistent UI in all browsers.
Experiments in creating Rancher catalog stacks.
REALbasic classes for submitting crash data to FogBugz.
A REALbasic library for validating UNIX crypt style passwords.
Manage all your WordPress 301 redirects and monitor 404 errors
Automatically exported from code.google.com/p/riak-dart
Riak database client, written in Dart.
An Amazon S3 Filesystem module for Codeception
SQL components for accelerating your application development with Xojo.
Simple javascript toast notifications http://johnpapa.net
Xojo web control for simple notifications.
